io.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.utility

Class DependencyUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.utility.DependencyUtilities

  • public final class DependencyUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Special dependency utilities used throughout the library and also open to users. Used for easier dependency management.

    • Constructor Summary
